metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14361 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in X.Org Server before xorg-x11-server 1.20.9. An Integer underflow leading to heap-buffer overflow may lead to a privilege escalation vulnerability. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
